name: Behemoth Bash
description: You bash with your gigantic shield. Make a melee attack on a creature, dealing 4d4 + MOVE steel damage on a hit. If the target was dynamaxed, double the overall damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d12 at level 5, 4d8 at level 10, and 8d6 at level 17.
